titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 508 S. Burleson, McCamey, Texas, as the "Claude W. Brown Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 4/7/1995--Introduced. Designates the United States Post Office building located at 508 S. Burleson, McCamey, Texas, as the Claude W. Brown Post Office Building.
